package.name: irobot_gazebo_msgs
package.author: Ekumen
package.description: iRobot plugins messages and services definitions. It contains the following messages: - Battery - Beacon - Bumper - BumperContact - Cliff - Docking - Duration - FloorSensor - IrRange - IrReceiver - JoystickCommand - MagneticReceiver - Motor - OdoaSim - OpticalMouse - PixartDistance - PosesStamped - RfReceiver - Rtf - SensorEmitterDescriptor - UiEvents - Vector2D - WheelDrop - WheelDropArray - WifiSignal It contains the following services: - CarpetAdder - DoorAngle - DoorState - FastForward - Force - Kidnap - Light - PartitionSpacePoints - Pose - SavePath - Slip
